title: Blue Essence??..
body:
Played a few games and i noticed i wasnt getting any Blue Essence AT ALL. I then went online to see if anyone else had this "problem" but all i read was that you get champion capsules when you level up? Waaaaaat??????? Are you serious lol. Fix this or half your player base is gonna decrease guarenteed. Im gone until you guys fix this.
 Alot of better games out there that isnt Pay2Play. {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body: Yeah don't worry the majority of us don't like it either and Riot better be doing something about it.
yea the blue essence shit is dumb people have to go to school an work 5 days a week and can sometimes onlt get in three games a day ad im not gonna level up off that

BE after every game is much preferred by the community and I think riot will notice that don't worry

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
How is this pay to play ? League of legends is completely free.

you dont get blue essence with the new patch( i wish we did get blue essence for every game)
anyways
